casebody.data:
THE EMILIA S. DE PEREZ. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 11, 1923.) No. 252. Kirlin, Woolsey, Campbell, Hickox & Keating, of New York City (L. De G. Potter and Albert H. Ely, Jr., both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Hunt, Hill & Betts, of New York City, for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed in open court.
